name: Blue Belt of the High Seas
data: It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It increases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
The belt will make you more powerful.
